Description:
We will travel for a couple of weeks to Kerala, in India and enjoy the forests, culture and cuisine of the place.
To see the planning of the Trip, you can visit Wanderlog.

Day-1 (August 3, 2025; Sunday)

We fly from Frankfurt to Cochin (Kochi), on Sunday with Qatar Airways.

QR68 - Qatar Airways

17:15 Frankfurt Frankfurt International Airport (FRA) -> 5h 55m Duration

00:10+1 Doha Hamad International Airport (DOH)

QR514 - Qatar Airways

01:45 Doha Hamad International Airport (DOH) -> 4h 30m Duration

08:45 Kochi Kochi International Airport (COK)


Day-2 (August 4, 2025; Monday)

We arrive in Cochin International Airport on, at 8:45 AM.

You wil be picked up from the airport and taken to our first Accomodation(Once upon the River), in Aluva.

We could travel to Lulu International Shopping mall, to get some kerala style clothes.


Day-3(August 5, 2025; Tuesday)

We visit Kerala Folklore Museum and Kerala Kalamandalam
We could visit the Mattanchery Old Town.
Some shopping could be done as well.
Also visit the GREAT K V Kathakali centre.
We could also visit Mattancherry Palace.
We will also try some food. 


Day-4(August 6, 2025; Wednesday)

We travel to the nilgiri hills, on the eastern side of Kerala, by car.
It is a 2 hour 18 minutes drive.
Our Accomodation is at Thekkady, called Kalpavanam Heritage Resort.

We will chill this day in the resort, where we stay.

For the forthcoming days, we will explore, the Periyar Tiger Reserve.

Optionall, we could visit Abrahams Spice Garden.

Day-5 (August 7, 2025; Thursday)

We could hike in the Periyar National Park this day.

Border Hiking

This is a day-long hiking programme within the Periyar Tiger Reserve. The undulating terrains and altitudinal hiking of 900 m to 1300 m will give you the glimpse of the lofty slopes bordering the region.

Gaur, sloth bear and elephants are often sighted apart from birds and butterflies from here.

This programme is open to a maximum of 10 tourists in 2 different groups. The trekkers along with two guides participate in the programme which starts at 08.00 hrs and ends in the evening.

The package includes food also.

Option 1: Throndiyar -> Link

Option 2: Brandipara -> Link


Day-6 (August 8, 2025; Friday)

Border Hiking / Bamboo Rafting

Option -1: Full day Rafting -> Link

Option-2: Half day Rafting  -> Link


Day-7 (August 9, 2025; Saturday)

This day, we vill visit the tea Plantations of Munnar.
Cinnamon Gardens Spice PlantationVisit or Munnar Tea Trail Tour


Day-8(August 10, 2025; Sunday)

We travel to Aleppey and spend a couple of days in a houseboat, sailing along the Vembanad Lake and the Backwaters of Pampa river.
It is a 3 hour drive to our accomodation.

We start at 12:30 PM and stay overnight in the boat.


Day-9(August 11, 2025; Monday)

We will spend the whole day in the boat, exploring the rice fields in Kuttanad with our boat.


Day-10(August 12, 2025; Tuesday)

After our life in the boat for a couple of days, it is time for us to relax and move to an Ayurvedic and Yoga Retreat, in Kuttambuzha(Munkudil Ayurveda Yoga Retreat).
It is a two hour drive to our accomodation.


Day-11(August 13, 2025; Wednesday)

We will spend the morning at the resort.
We could visit the Elephant Training Centre at Kodanad, in the afternoon.

Day-12(August 14, 2025; Thursday)

We will spend the morning at the resort.

Day-13(August 15, 2025; Friday)

We fly from Cochin (Kochi) to Frankfurt, on Sunday with Qatar Airways.

EY335 Etihad Airways

22:15 Kochi Kochi International Airport (COK) -> 4h  Duration

00:45+1 Zayed International Airport, Abu Dhabi (AUH)

EY121 - Etihad Airways
